```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
#| warning: false


library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#| label: loaddata
#| warning: false
#| message: false

data <- read_csv("data/studentData.csv")
```

```{r}
#| label: models
#| warning: false
#| cache: true

# Define the formula for the model
formula <- bf(GPA ~ Age + StudyTimeWeekly + Absences + ParentalSupport + Tutoring)

# Fit the model using brms
model <- brm(
  formula = formula,
  data = data,
  family = gaussian(),
  silent = 2,
  refresh = 0,
  seed = 76)
  
fixef(model)
pp_check(model)


```
